name: Amishion Impossible
description:
An entry for the 2014 7 Day First Person Shooter challenge.

The year is 2004. Human civilization lies in ruins following the Y2K AI Paradigm Shift Incident. One man stands against the rogue appliances that have laid waste to humanity, struggling to rebuild his barn, and eventually, society.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys or WASD - move
Mouse - look around
Left click or Space - left weapon
Right click or E - right weapon

FEATURES:

Six 'wacky' guns
Seven dangerous enemies
At least one terrible pun
Procedurally generated city
Realistic dual-wielding action

CREDITS:

Coder: Earok
Crayon Master: Liannethy
Fridge Butt Artist: Noah
Literally Did Nothing: Sergio

Font: "Visitor" by Ænigma - http://www.dafont.com/visitor.font
